hero.title: Making a Difference Together
hero.subtitle: Join us in our mission to create positive change in communities worldwide

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Wells of Change is dedicated to providing clean water, sustainable agriculture, and education to underserved communities around the world. Through collaboration with local partners, we empower communities to create lasting change.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: Discover how we're making an impact

clean_water.title: Clean Water Access
clean_water.description: We build wells and water systems to provide clean, safe drinking water to communities in need.

sustainable_agriculture.title: Sustainable Agriculture
sustainable_agriculture.description: Teaching farming techniques that improve crop yields while protecting the environment.

education.title: Education Initiatives
education.description: Supporting schools and educational programs to create opportunities for future generations.

getInvolved.subtitle: Join us in making a difference

getInvolved.pageIntro: There are many ways to support our mission and make a difference. Whether you're looking to volunteer your time, make a donation, or start your own fundraising campaign, your contribution helps us create lasting change in communities worldwide.

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.intro: Volunteering with Wells of Change is a rewarding experience that allows you to directly contribute to our mission while developing valuable skills and connections.

field.title: Field Volunteer
field.description: Join us on the ground in communities around the world, helping with well construction, agricultural training, or educational programs.

remote.title: Remote Volunteer
remote.description: Support our mission from anywhere by contributing your skills in areas such as graphic design, translation, social media, or grant writing.

event.title: Event Volunteer
event.description: Help us organize and run fundraising events, awareness campaigns, and community outreach programs in your local area.

process.title: Application Process
process.step1: Submit an application through our online form

donate.title: Donate
donate.intro: Your financial support enables us to continue our vital work in communities around the world. Every donation, regardless of size, makes a meaningful difference.

impact.title: Your Impact
impact.water: $25 provides clean water to a family for a month
impact.training: $100 funds agricultural training for a farmer
impact.school: $500 helps support a community school for a month
impact.well: $2,500 builds a well serving an entire community

monthly.title: Monthly Giving
monthly.description: Become a sustaining supporter with a recurring monthly donation that provides reliable funding for our programs.

oneTime.title: One-time Donation
oneTime.description: Make a single donation to support our work and help us reach our goals.

honorary.title: Honorary & Memorial Gifts
honorary.description: Make a donation in honor or memory of someone special.

corporate.title: Corporate Giving
corporate.description: Partner with us through corporate matching gifts, sponsorships, or employee engagement programs.

planned.title: Planned Giving
planned.description: Include Wells of Change in your estate planning to create a lasting legacy.

fundraise.title: Fundraise
fundraise.intro: Start your own fundraising campaign to support Wells of Change. Whether it's a birthday, special event, or personal challenge, your fundraiser can make a significant impact.

howTo.title: How It Works
howTo.step1: Create your fundraising page on our platform
howTo.step2: Set a goal and share your story
howTo.step3: Share with friends, family, and social networks
howTo.step4: Track your progress and thank your donors

birthday.title: Birthday Campaign
birthday.description: Ask for donations instead of gifts for your birthday.

athletic.title: Athletic Challenge
athletic.description: Run, walk, bike, or swim to raise funds for clean water.

event.title: Community Event
event.description: Host a dinner, concert, or auction to support our cause.

school.title: School Fundraiser
school.description: Engage students in raising awareness and funds for global issues.
